name: M.E.C.K. 415
description:
You're the last human being on Earth.  An asteroid collision is imminent.
Take one last look around your lab before flying off to meet the others at Elysium.

Made for the January '19 mech-themed #bitsyjam.

By Samantha Schaffer & Tom Chataway

Song credit: "Overheat" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
